plugins.author: FÃ¡bio Ferreira
plugins.title: Xperience
plugins.synopsis: Xperience is the newest skin plugin that promises to improve your experience with Movian. It tries to bring the best themes of other Media Centers to Movian, including Xperience 1080. Note: Touchscreen is not supported
plugins.description: Xperience is the newest skin plugin that promises to improve your experience with Movian.

plugins.author: andreus sebes (andreus.sebes@gmail.com)
plugins.title: WEBmedia
plugins.description:
WEBmedia plugin for Showtime is a internet source media reader

Can read RSS feeds, Imagecast, Podcast, Videocast, Live TV/Radio (RTMP), Web Resources and Web Folders.

plugins.author: lprot, FÃ¡bio Ferreira (facanferff)
plugins.title: TwitchTV
plugins.description: Twitch is the world's leading video platform and community for gamers. More than 45 million gamers gather every month on Twitch to broadcast, watch and chat about gaming. Twitch's video platform is the backbone of both live and on-demand distribution for the entire video game ecosystem. This includes game publishers, developers, media outlets, industry conventions and press conferences, casual gamers and gaming for charity events. Twitch also caters to the entire esports industry, spanning the top pro players, tournaments, leagues, talk shows and organizations. Learn more at http://twitch.tv

plugins.author: lprot
plugins.title: Online TV
plugins.synopsis: Online TV - collection of online tv sources
plugins.description:
Online TV - is M3U/XML playlist loader and collection of online tv sources.

For more information visit corresponding websites.

plugins.synopsis: themoviedb.org is a free and community maintained movie database.
plugins.description: themoviedb.org is a free and community maintained movie database.

plugins.author: Wain
plugins.title: ThePirateBay
plugins.description: The Pirate Bay plugin for Movian. Yarr! Download music, movies, games, software and much more. The Pirate Bay is the galaxy's most resilient BitTorrent site.

plugins.author: lprot
plugins.title: TED Talks
plugins.synopsis: Here you will find the best talks and performances from TED conferences.
plugins.description:
TED Talks began as a simple attempt to share what happens at TED with the world. Under the moniker ideas worth spreading, talks were released online. They rapidly attracted a global audience in the millions. Indeed, the reaction was so enthusiastic that the entire TED website has been reengineered around TED Talks, with the goal of giving everyone on-demand access to the world's most inspiring voices.

Learn more on http://www.ted.com
